reviews.review: Seriously, you have not played this game? Also buy a copy for a friend for great co-op!
Great game with great graphics and story.
O jogo requer muita paciência, criatividade e um amigo pra jogar com vc... ou seja se vc ñ tem amigos nem compra essa merda! pórem o jogo é bom. :)

i like game 10/10 would game again

gud job Valve
Após superar minhas expectativa com o Portal, me supreende mais ainda, com seus puzzles desafiadores e um poucos e estressantes por ser difício. Recomendo para todos Portal 2.
Awesome game, I've played the first one so nice to have a sequal!

A classic sequel to a classic game! It takes all the building blocks from the first Portal and expands the basic ideas to every imaginable direction. It's mostly a good thing, but I did also get a feeling that the game could've easily been split into two separate games, which would've given every new gimmick a little bit more room to breathe. Now some of the neat new mechanics felt even somewhat underused, at least in the main story mode. There are also a bunch of fun co-op courses and some not-as-fun achievements tied to them, like time trials and no death challenges. But even if I have a few negative words from the package as a whole, all in all it's still an entertaining game that continues the legacy of the first part very nicely.
Me ha gustado mucho este juego. Lo recomiendo antes que el primero. La duración es aceptable y es muy entretenido.

¿Has jugado portal 1? ¿No? Entonces juega portal 1. 
¿Te ha gustado portal 1? ¿Sí? perfecto, pues esta secuela te expande la idea a lo grande con muchisima más duracion, muchísima más historia, más tipos de pruebas, presentando como novedad por ejemplo los geles y por supuesto: más humor también. 
Además de modo cooperativo y editor de niveles con Steam workshop para que puedas descargarte contenido prácticamente infinito. 

Si portal 1 era una básicamente una demo de un concepto, portal 2 es un "vamos a exprimir y experimentar con el concepto hasta dar todo lo que puede dar de si". 
Es probablemente el mejor juego de puzzles y plataformas que ha habido, una verdadera obra maestra tanto en diseño de nivel como en narrativa. 
Lo único malo, para algunos, es que sigue manteniendo el nivel de accesibilidad que introducía el primer juego, por lo que si buscas un verdadero desafío mental, no creo que la historia principal te satisfaga. Pero tal vez encuentres un buen reto en el modo cooperativo o en los mapas de workshop. 
A cambio, cualquier persona podrá disfrutar de este juego sin atascarse ni necesitar ayuda. 

Y por favor, jugad el cooperativo, no es un simple añadido al juego, es prácticamente más de la mitad del mismo, teniendo su propia historia y personajes, y algunos de los mejores puzles de todo el juego. Buscad un amigo que lo tenga, o convenced a alguno para que se lo compre también. 

No creo que decepcione a nadie. Supongo que a estas alturas casi todos lo conoceríais ya, pero si has llegado hasta aquí por casualidad sin conocer este juego de antes, ni lo dudes, este juego no solo es un clásico, es historia del videojuego en estado puro. 

Nota: 10/10

Portal 2 is one of the highest rated steam games for good reason. Nedless to say it's an amazing game that improves upon the already great Portal 1 in every way. Comedy, puzzles, story, everything is top notch here. The co-op is a ton of fun too.

If you haven't already, check out some of the community-made mods and workshop maps. There is some seriously impressive stuff out there.

Co napsat ke hře která je v tolika srdcích a i mém zapsána na tak vysokém postu?
Příběh Aperture Science Vás vtáhne, i samotný hlavní story ark, hudba, postavy,... Ale o tom bylo napsáno již mnoho.

Britský humor.. Máte jej rádi? Ano? Tuhle hru si užijete dvakrát více. Komunitní centrum je živé, tvorba map zábavná, co-op režim stejně dobrý jako solo. Kreativita mnoha tvůrců nezná mezí a mnoho map je tak dobrých že by vydali na samotný přidaný obsah.

This might be the best game I've ever played. It is absoloutely amazing. Valve did everything right, and they did it perfect. I have never played a video game that makes you develope a relationship with a character in less than 5 seconds, Wheately is by far my favorite video game character ever, and he's just a little ball. glaDOS is amazing too, the voice actors for both of them did an outstanding job. The concept of Portals is simple, but it leads to great challenges, fun puzzles, and overall great gameplay in general. I HIGHLY reccomend this game (and the 1st portal) to anyone who wants to have a fun time and enjoy a great, and deep story.... seriously, the story and lore to this game is neverending. (play the 1st one first or this won't make sense at alllllll)
Its alright.
Прекрасная игра, несмотря на свою давность, всё ещё удивляет. Стоит своих денег и даже больше)
veeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeery niceeeeeeeeeee

Господа из вальве - мастера делать поистине оригинальные игры. Так в своём время выходивший в Orange Box Portal не стал исключением. Конечно сейчас господин Габен r.i.p.-нул производство игр (условно) благодаря миллиардам денежек, получаемых со скинов и компендиумов в небезызвестной DOKA 2. Ну да ладно. Прелюдии...

Первая часть была интересной головоломкой от первого лица в уникальном сеттинге с телепортами. 
Вторая часть превзошла оригинал по всем фронтам (как было и с Half Life). Вкратце расскажу о плюсах, дабы не заморачивать вам голову нудным чтением.

ПОЧЕМУ В ЭТО НУЖНО ИГРАТЬ:

- Драматургия. Она появилась и реально берет вас за яйца. Интригует до последней минуты.
- Развитие персонажей
- Остроумные диалоги
- Сеттинг стал ещё более разнообразным

На этом в общем-то  и всё. Игра  очень хороша. Для любителя головоломок сюда ещё и экшон подвезли и интересные монологи) Играть второй раз, конечно, уже не так интересно, но, думаю, когда-нибудь будет и третий.

Однозначно рекомендую творение габена и иже их.
insanely low price for a game this in-depth. buy it for yourself and maybe even for a friend, for the extra multiplayer content

Within close to 7 hours, you will have experienced the basic experience of Portal 2.
This, however, is simply the first in a long series of enjoyment you may get from this game.
Your second experience may or may not be shorter or longer depending on whether or not you paid attention to the expansive amount of puzzles, dangerous weaponry, and explosives that you encountered on your first testing run.
If you or a loved one enjoy such things, this is the initiative for you.

Wow, Portal 2. I used to play this on PS3 and had so many great memories. And I still do. This is probably in my Opinion the Greatest Game in the Whole World. That might sound a bit of a stretch for a game that is 7 years old but my god is it a masterpiece. The story is gripping and deep (Like the LORE), the multiplayer is memorable when you play with a Friend and the Villians are actually Threatening (Well, 1 of them) and the Graphics and Dialogue is so Immersive, if you don't get what I mean i'll tell you one thing. Play. This. Game. Then you will understand. 11/10. 

I actually nominated this for Labour of Love 2018 Award even though it's been out for Years, I still think it is the greatest. Same for 2019, still the bloody best!

Обычно людям не нравится, когда над ними издеваются и ставят эксперименты. Но в случае с Portal многие готовы платить за это!
Portal 2 — неотделимый от первой части эксперимент. Это головоломка для всех. Это великолепная история и безупречный стиль. Это одна из лучших кооперативных игр, если уж на то пошло. Увидеть Portal 2 от заставки до замечательного финала должен всякий, кто любит ироничные тексты и чья голова не набита опилками:D

Pixel hunting. It happens. What also happens is a great but not so great game with a few flaws. If you’re looking for a game to do a marathon, don’t do it with this one. It gets repetitive on some of the first bits. But towards the end, the story unfolds and [spoiler] you find out that your once-friend actually is dowsed with power. [/spoiler] The game is pretty good for the first time playing it. After a while, the only fun thing is playing people’s steam workshop levels. The game is okay. 6/10 -Mo447
Played this on XBOX and thoroughly enjoyed it. really like the voices and the physics of it all. great quirky storline too.

While I did enjoy single player, the main reason it's one of my favourite game is the co-op mode. Going through puzzles with my friends allows us to just chill and spend time together, have fun ! IE taunting glados in front of the security cameras after finishing a test chamber

Extraordinairement original et novateur. Je pensais trouver un jeu de plates-formes/réflexion un peu monocorde à la difficulté pas forcément dosée idéalement :  non et non. Sa complexité se prend en main très facilement au fil de la progression (donc on n'y est que très rarement durablement bloqué lorsqu'on a intégré ses mécaniques) et ce jeu intègre une partie "aventure" qui n'est pas sans rappeler les péripéties de Gordon Freeman dans le 1er HalfLife. Beaucoup d'humour et d'imprévus tout au long de l'immersion dans ce complexe scientifique. Si on rajoute à ça des possibilités multiplay LAN qui apportent une autre dimension au jeu, un moteur stable et léger, pour ce prix c'est un jeu incontournable : pas juste "recommandé" ou "non-recommandé" :  10/10 sans hésitation.
